prerequisite: MUT 1121, MUT 1122, MUT 3XXX or similar level of keyboard competency
moduleDescription: This module is a continuation of MUT 3XXX Intermediate Keyboard Studies. Students learn more advanced keyboard skills and techniques that enhance their musical experiences in performing and teaching. Such skills include orchestral score-reading, application of complex harmony in harmonization and transposition, study of modes and other scales, keyboard improvisation, pianist techniques, and instrumental and choir accompanying skills.
faculty: YONG SIEW TOH CONSERVATORY OF MUSIC
department: YONG SIEW TOH CONSERVATORY OF MUSIC
